```{r}
heights <- modelr::heights
```

```{r}
heights |>
  select(income, height) |>
  filter(income < 300000) |>
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = height, y = income)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = lm)
```

```{r}
summary(heights)
```
